title: Pink Wards are Wrong?
body:
So, I use Gentleman Poro wards. Only other one I own was the S3 reward for my 12 ranked games before I nope'd outta ranked.
And yet, when I use the upgraded ward trinket for pink wards, the astronaut poro ward skin is used instead.
Pretty sure this is not intended.

replies.body: This is a known issue and we're working on a fix. Thanks for the report!

My sundisk wards turn into Amumu wards if I use a trinket pink xD
.
Same here, its kinda cute though. {{summoner:31}}
